title: Add .world file and ability to change GUI for left virtual hand

content.raw: We may encounter left-handed amputees in research. Currently, the software only has right-handed functionality. A left hand .world file and right/left GUI toggle is needed for this reason. Adjunct to this, the GUI should be adapted for left handed participants. Adaptation of the GUI for left-handedness includes: changing the contact sensor hand model in the GUI to show a left hand; tasks called via the GUI should be able to be oriented for left-handed participants, so the objects are placed on the left side of the table.
